extendedInfo.description: If you are a sentimentalist, here for you, blue hearts and a beautiful heart that falling in water and splash your phone, all underwater...so cute!!! :)This live wallpaper born from fantastic idea of my first app "Magic touch:Heart water splash" view https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.custom.lwp.MagictouchHeartwatersplashoneIt's very interactive. With finger touch you create a water's ripple effect...you see the result effect!In setting menu is possible to set three different backgrounds.This live wallpaper that takes up very little space on your phone and also can be moved on SD memory.Enjoy!!!Instruction for use:Home -> Menu -> Wallpapers -> Live Wallpaperswww.reviewbreaker.com writes about us:Heart water splash is a beautiful live wallpaper application in which charming water splash hearts appear. This app is touch sensitive and whenever you touch the screen you can see the rippling effect. There are 3 beautiful images which can be set as background. This amazing app is available for free in the android market.Creating an app takes time and money, In order to keep creating great (and free!) apps, we are using a new search service to monetize our apps. With this service we are able to create more great apps for you guys. This option bundles a few search points (push notification or other) for you to use. You can erase these easily and with no effect to our app. Thanks!

reviews.title: Its looks like a,real somwthing its fan
reviews.comment: I love it just like the way it looks
reviews.author: Palvin Wallace
